text: The Old Nest is a 1921 American drama silent black and white film directed by Reginald Barker and starring Helene Chadwick. It was awarded for the National High School Students' Poll for Best Picture They Had Ever Seen. It is based on the short story by Rupert Hughes, which was one of the most notably adaptations as Behind the Screen (1916). ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * * Category:American drama films Category:1921 drama films Category:1921 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Reginald Barker Category:Films with screenplays by Rupert Hughes Category:Films based on works by Rupert Hughes Category:Goldwyn Pictures films Category:American films
title: The Old Nest
